thread.title: 21 Ways To Save Money And Still Have A Blast With Kids This Summer
thread.title_full: 21 Ways To Save Money And Still Have A Blast With Kids This Summer

author: Jade Walker
title: 21 Ways To Save Money And Still Have A Blast With Kids This Summer
text:
21 Ways To Save Money And Still Have A Blast With Kids This Summer Today Posted: 07/10/2015 Hooray For Summer! 
Summer camps and summer vacations and summer sports and summer excursions can cost a LOT of money. (Ugh! Boo! Hiss!) Thankfully, though, there are so many low-cost ways to keep the kids happy and entertained while school is out â€” and the TODAY Parenting Team has got them figured out.
